name: py-pytz
description: World timezone definitions, modern and historical.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-tempora
dependent_to.description: Objects and routines pertaining to date and time (tempora)

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-utils
dependent_to.description:
The oslo.utils library provides support for common utility type
functions, such as encoding, exception handling, string manipulation,
and time handling.

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-serialization
dependent_to.description:
The oslo.serialization library provides support for representing
objects in transmittable and storable formats, such as Base64, JSON and
MessagePack.

dependent_to.name: py-plotly
dependent_to.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python

dependent_to.name: py-google-api-core
dependent_to.description: Google API client core library.

dependent_to.name: py-py2neo
dependent_to.description:
Py2neo is a client library and toolkit for working with Neo4j from
within Python applications and from the command line.

dependent_to.name: py-inference-schema
dependent_to.description:
This package is intended to provide a uniform schema for common machine
learning applications, as well as a set of decorators that can be used
to aid in web based ML prediction applications.

dependent_to.name: py-flask-restful
dependent_to.description: Simple framework for creating REST APIs

dependent_to.name: py-apache-beam
dependent_to.description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-cli
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Command-Line Tools.

dependent_to.name: py-django
dependent_to.description: The Web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.

dependent_to.name: py-fs
dependent_to.description: Python's filesystem abstraction layer

dependent_to.name: py-celery
dependent_to.description: Celery - Distributed Task Queue.

dependent_to.name: py-hypothesis
dependent_to.description: A library for property based testing.

dependent_to.name: py-babel
dependent_to.description:
Babel is an integrated collection of utilities that assist in
internationalizing and localizing Python applications, with an emphasis
on web-based applications.

dependent_to.name: py-mffpy
dependent_to.description: Reader and Writer for Philips' MFF file format.

dependent_to.name: py-dateparser
dependent_to.description: dateparser -- python parser for human readable dates

dependent_to.name: hicops
dependent_to.description:
HiCOPS is a software framework for accelerating database peptide search
workflows on supercomputers. HiCOPS provided algorithm-independent
parallelizations and optimizations can be extended into new HPC database
search algorithms or scalably accelerate the existing ones.

dependent_to.name: py-tzlocal
dependent_to.description: tzinfo object for the local timezone.

dependent_to.name: py-pandas
dependent_to.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependent_to.name: py-pysolar
dependent_to.description:
Pysolar is a collection of Python libraries for simulating the
irradiation of any point on earth by the sun. It includes code for
extremely precise ephemeris calculations, and more.

dependent_to.name: py-flask-babel
dependent_to.description: Implements i18n and l10n support for Flask.

dependent_to.name: py-python-xmp-toolkit
dependent_to.description: Python XMP Toolkit for working with metadata.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-core
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-core contains functionality for creating and managing: *
Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments and runs; * Machine
learning compute respources; * Models, images and web services.

dependent_to.name: py-neotime
dependent_to.description: Nanosecond resolution temporal types

dependent_to.name: py-apscheduler
dependent_to.description: In-process task scheduler with Cron-like capabilities.

dependent_to.name: py-owslib
dependent_to.description:
OWSLib is a Python package for client programming with Open Geospatial
Consortium (OGC) web service (hence OWS) interface standards, and their
related content models.

dependent_to.name: py-convertdate
dependent_to.description:
Converts between Gregorian dates and other calendar systems.Calendars
included: Baha'i, French Republican, Hebrew, Indian Civil, Islamic, ISO,
Julian, Mayan and Persian.

dependent_to.name: py-astropy
dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.
